function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Substantial increase in time spent on entertainment during lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rise in diy and home repairs during lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in annoyance ratings due to lockdown may lead to a false sense of improvement in noise issues, potentially causing complacency in preventative measures.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consistent high annoyance ratings during lockdown suggest underlying factors contributing to dissatisfaction with noise levels.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in transportation noise during lockdown does not significantly impact annoyance levels from outdoor noise sources.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased negative perception of bird songs in urban areas due to reduced ambient noise levels during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction noise becoming more dominant in the urban environment during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in attitudes towards outdoor noise levels during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings for neighbour noise sources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in outdoor noise levels due to lockdown measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints on social media","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher percentage of responses hearing neighbor noise in flats","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference in neighbor noise perception based on time spent in different areas of the house","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased percentage of respondents hearing neighbour noise during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in mean annoyance ratings for certain noise sources during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of neighbour noise annoyance ratings across dwelling types","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased noise complaints across various noise sources","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant increase in indoor noise levels during the lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sleep disturbance due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints during lockdown, particularly due to birds and construction/building works","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise complaints for transport and voice/instrument sources during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased number of noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in tweets with noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparing noise levels before and during lockdown may indicate changes in behavior and activity, impacting disease spread","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Annoyance caused by noise pollution may lead to stress and weakened immune systems, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of annoyance ratings to percentage of highly annoyed may oversimplify the impact of noise on mental and physical health","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact and airborne particles due to close proximity in densely populated living spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared communal spaces and contact with commonly touched surfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through manual extraction of tweets","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related tweets","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to potentially harmful content during manual tweet extraction","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection from twitter may include biased samples and may not represent the entire population’s attitudes towards noise","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of attitudes towards noise before and during the lockdown may not account for external factors that influence noise perception","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis rely on social media, which may not capture the attitudes of individuals who do not use social media platforms","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased noise levels during lockdown may lead to an increase in human interaction and activity, contributing to the potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to reduced traffic flow and movement restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased traffic flow leading to improved air quality and reduced noise levels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global crises triggered by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of water, food, and poor health conditions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragile health security capacities leading to ineffective handling of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of public health challenges in developing countries due to inward focus of developed economies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in the implementation of the sustainable development goals sdgs due to socio-economic pressures and set-backs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven responses and equivocal commitments to change","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of the virus due to resistance to shut down economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Division between cautious and aggressive approaches to economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to taking action against climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergent national positions undermining international solidarity in fighting covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shutdown of economies leading to reduction in co2 emissions but rise in waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
